name: Moto 355: Extreme Motorcycle Racing
description:
Motorcycles are those things our mothers tell us to stay away from when we are kids. "They are dangerous" they tell us. Blah Blah. Well, here's your chance to try our a racing Road Bike or an Motocross Bike. Earn cash by drifting, extreme jumping, going super fast speeds.

The goal of the game is to collect 355 coins found around the map.

Loads of ramps and extreme jumps, high speed chases. Smash into traffic going over 200km per hour.

Chase down the helicopters, airplanes. Explore the real working airport.

Rain, lighting, huge ramps, highway speed racing, traffic, obstacles all included. All in super high quality 3D graphics.

Realistic racing physics. Yes, the physics could be better, but they are pretty fun. 3D Racing Simulation at its best.

If you want something, we'll add it. Please write us and let us know. jellyfishgiant1@gmail.com
